title: Expand gourmet products catalog with distinct placeholder images

requirements.summary: Expand the static products catalog data to include all user-provided gourmet products without changing the Products page layout.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/data/products.ts` contains the original 3 products plus new entries for each user-provided product name: Beluga caviar; Jamón ibérico de bellota; Duck foie gras; Premium saffron threads; Manuka honey UMF 20+; Specialty microlot coffee; Silver Needle white tea; Madagascar Bourbon vanilla; Alba white truffle; Smoked sea salt flakes; Traditional Balsamic Vinegar of Modena DOP; Black truffle oil; Artisanal bronze-cut pasta; Aged Carnaroli rice; Wild berry gourmet jam; French whole-grain mustard; Natural fermentation artisanal panettone.
Each new product entry includes all required `Product` fields (`id`, `name`, `description`, `price`, `imageSrc`, `altText`) as defined in `frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts`.
Each new product has a unique, stable `id` suitable for use as a React key and cart identifier (no duplicates across the full catalog).
The Products screen (`frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx`) renders the expanded catalog by mapping over `products` with no runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Append new Product entries for: Beluga caviar; Jamón ibérico de bellota; Duck foie gras; Premium saffron threads; Manuka honey UMF 20+; Specialty microlot coffee; Silver Needle white tea; Madagascar Bourbon vanilla; Alba white truffle; Smoked sea salt flakes; Traditional Balsamic Vinegar of Modena DOP; Black truffle oil; Artisanal bronze-cut pasta; Aged Carnaroli rice; Wild berry gourmet jam; French whole-grain mustard; Natural fermentation artisanal panettone. Ensure each entry includes `id`, `name`, `description`, `price`, `imageSrc`, and unique descriptive `altText`, and that all `id` values are unique across the entire array.

requirements.summary: Add distinct placeholder images as static assets for each newly added product and reference them from the catalog data.
acceptanceCriteria: For each newly added product, `imageSrc` points to a unique path under `/assets/generated/` and the referenced file exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
All new product images load correctly in the Products screen (no broken image links).
Each new product includes a specific, descriptive `altText` that matches the product shown (not reused across multiple products).

requirements.summary: Ensure newly added products work with existing client-side cart state, add/remove actions, and totals without changing cart behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the “Add to Cart” button on any newly added product adds that product to the cart and shows the existing success toast pattern.
The Cart screen displays newly added products correctly (name, quantity, and totals behave the same as for the original products).
Removing newly added products from the cart works and updates totals correctly.

file_operations.description: Tighten typing for `handleAddToCart` to use the shared `Product` type (from `frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts`) rather than `typeof products[0]`, keeping the existing add-to-cart + success toast behavior unchanged for all products.
